docs.snippet: "There is a woman in the public eye, whose name had all along been associated, in our mind, with the 'Yankee,' 'Quack,' and 'Humbug.' But it is so no longer, and we desire to wrest her name from all such suspicious association in all other minds.

headline.main: THE FLORENCE NIGHTINGALE OF THE NURSERY.; The following is an extract from a letter written by Rev. C.Z. Weiser, to the "German Reformed Messenger" at Chambersburgh, Penn. A BENEFACTRESS.

docs.lead_paragraph: "There is a woman in the public eye, whose name had all along been associated, in our mind, with the 'Yankee,' 'Quack,' and 'Humbug.' But it is so no longer, and we desire to wrest her name from all such suspicious association in all other minds.

headline.main: All About a Trip to California.; SUPREME COURT CIRCUIT.

docs.snippet: Mr. BALL presented a minority report against repealing the Sunday laws in New-York and Brooklyn, so far as to allow the sale of lager-bier, ale and malt liquors on Sunday. The report says that the German population are divided on the question, half...
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. BALL presented a minority report against repealing the Sunday laws in New-York and Brooklyn, so far as to allow the sale of lager-bier, ale and malt liquors on Sunday. The report says that the German population are divided on the question, half of them being opposed to the proposed amendment, and takes ground against the sale of beer on Sunday as much as the sale of liquors.

docs.snippet: During the first nine weeks of the present year ending on the 4th inst., the City Inspector has reported 3,554 deaths in the City. The average for the first five weeks, (January,) was 397 each week; for the last four weeks, (February,) 392 each week....
docs.lead_paragraph: During the first nine weeks of the present year ending on the 4th inst., the City Inspector has reported 3,554 deaths in the City. The average for the first five weeks, (January,) was 397 each week; for the last four weeks, (February,) 392 each week. The returns show a decrease of 856, or 19 per cent. as compared with the same period in 1860.

docs.snippet: The question of Fort Sumpter is still in abeyance or, rather in uncertainty. The Administration is disposed to keep its own counsel in reference to it for which nobody, probably, will blame them, when a too free knowledge of their intentions might be...
docs.lead_paragraph: The question of Fort Sumpter is still in abeyance or, rather in uncertainty. The Administration is disposed to keep its own counsel in reference to it for which nobody, probably, will blame them, when a too free knowledge of their intentions might be a serious disadvantage.
